job.title: Senior Software Engineer, Payments
job.description: ltstronggtltugtcompany descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwish is a mobile ecommerce platform that flips traditional shopping on its head we connect hundreds of millions of people with the widest selection of delightful surprising andmost importantlyaffordable products delivered directly to their doors each day on wish millions of customers in more than countries around the world discover new products for our over million merchant partners anyone with a good idea and a mobile phone can instantly tap into a global marketltbrgtltbrgtweampaposre fueled by creating unique products and experiences that give people access to a new type of commerce where all are welcome if youve been searching for a supportive environment to chase your curiosity and use data to investigate the questions that matter most to you this is the placeltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtjob descriptionltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtthe goal of the payments team is to provide buyers and sellers everywhere with a frictionless payments experience on our platform in just over five years we have built a business with a truly global reach and operations in over countries this is a great opportunity for an engineer to own high impact initiatives on a highvolume mission critical systemltbrgtltbrgtwe are in charge of building and maintaining our own global payments infrastructure at all levels of the stack we are responsible for the payments experience end to end from the seamless checkout flow that allows customers around the world to purchase goods in their preferred methods to the backend apis and payment processor integrationsltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for strong fullstack and backend software engineers to join a small and nimble team and help define and execute wishampaposs strategy for global payments the ideal candidate will combine solid engineering and product skills and thrive in a fastpaced iterative and collaborative environment you will tackle exciting technical challenges that come with scale huge volumes of transactions currencies and methods to support and have responsibility measured in billionsltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtwhat youampaposll be doingltbrgtltstronggtltulgtltligthave a critical role in building and maintaining our payments platform processing billions of dollars per yearltligtltligtmanage all technical aspects of relationships with payment providers and integrate new payment methods into our payment platformltligtltligtimplement and deliver new payment features leading to higher checkout conversionltligtltligtbuild reporting and monitoring tools to ensure the stability and security of the payments systemltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtqualificationsltbrgtltugtltstronggtltulgtltligtbachelors degree in computer science or related field or equivalent work experienceltligtltligt years of industry experience building data driven systems but we do realize quality of experience is more important than actual yearsltligtltligtbonus experience integrating with payment service providers eg stripe adyenltligtltligtbonus familiarity with our tech stack python mongodb aws reactjsltligtltligtbonus experience with ab testing and etl processltbrgtltligtltulgtltstronggtltugtadditional informationltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtwish values diversity and is committed to creating an inclusive work environment we provide equal employment opportunity for all applicants and employees we do not discriminate based on any legallyprotected class or characteristic employment decisions are made based on qualifications merit and business needs if you need assistance or accommodation due to a disability please let your recruiter know for job positions in san francisco ca and other locations where required we will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest and conviction recordsltbrgtltbrgtindividuals applying for positions at wish including california residents can see our privacy policy
